projects.name: Recent projects
projects.parragraph: I will show you how i am able to translate your company and customer needs into functional and appealing interactive applications.

blackCard.title: Robinfood staff user WebApp
blackCard.content: This is a modularize WebApp created using Vue.js + Typescript for Staff Users. Among other things, it allows you to create brands, promotions, products, schedules and stores into the different integrations that the company had with delivery applications, own platforms and application.

whiteCard.title: Proa WebApp and landing page
whiteCard.content: I designed and builded this landing page and WebApp using React.js for an B2B SaaS electronic signature company based in Colombia. In addition, i created login, document preview and document loader section for users.
